summary: Changes most of the text in the loading screens to be a little more... comical.
descriptionHtml:
Now with Screenshots!

Inspired by Toothman's funny loading screen mod for Oblivion, I decided to create one for Skyrim seeing as no one else did it.

Now, this mod contains humor that not everyone will find funny, for it contains; lame jokes, immature jokes, some swearing, references to things (such as music and tv shows) that only a few understand and a few insults directly to you (not anything too bad). So, if you're not entertained by that sort of thing, then this mod is not for you and I will not be making a 'cleaner' version of this mod.

I don't take credit for 100% of the jokes since I did use a few I found across the internet so you may have see one or two of them already.

Installation: I'ts just a single .esp file, just extract it from the .7z file with Winrar, then drag and drop it into your skyrim data file and activate it. Shouldn't be too much of a challenge.

Compatibility: Preferably the latest version of Skyrim, I didn't used any of the DLC when creating this mod so they are not necessary.
If you are using a mod that already changes the loading screens, then it may cause some problems.

Bugs: I haven't completely tested this mod since I created it and wouldn't find the jokes to be too funny as I wrote most of them.
This is my first mod for Skyrim so please be nice.
author: Dualkiller3000
